internal.content: --- title: Elyra canvas overview description: Elyra canvas overview --- export const Title = () => ( Elyra Canvas overview ); Elyra canvas is an open source tool that allows for the dragging and dropping of node elements across a common canvas while giving the user the ability to edit the properties of those nodes. ## Canvas Wiki For more information, please visit the Canvas homepage and Wiki [here](https://github.com/elyra-ai/canvas/wiki)

MdxNode.rawBody: --- title: Elyra canvas overview description: Elyra canvas overview --- export const Title = () => ( Elyra Canvas overview ); Elyra canvas is an open source tool that allows for the dragging and dropping of node elements across a common canvas while giving the user the ability to edit the properties of those nodes. ## Canvas Wiki For more information, please visit the Canvas homepage and Wiki [here](https://github.com/elyra-ai/canvas/wiki)
